{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3360476,"name":"Jp","username":"AndromedaHelix","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/andromedahelix/{size}/175921_2.png","created_at":"2024-04-12T22:34:45.625Z","cooked":"

While tuning our adjustable shooter angle through DynamicMotionMagic, we’ve noticed that when first deploying code, it doesn’t reach the desired position, no matter the setpoint. However, after “homing” the shooter and then searching for a separate position (or the same position), it works without issues.

I’m pretty sure its not a mechanical thing, because when testing with regular MotionMagic, it works perfectly

Here is my code: Voltec-2024/src/main/java/com/team6647/subsystems/shooter/pivot/ShooterPivotIOTalonFX.java at 2fc7118d4d0d7094a08c4e768061ff084bf83396 · VOLTEC6647/Voltec-2024 · GitHub

I wasn’t able to find any solutions.
